refrigerator: Toppings: cheese, sour cream, tomatoes, lettuce, avocado, hot sauce, etc.

sections.title: 🧑‍🍳 Recipe
items: Place chicken breasts in the bottom of the slow cooker insert.
Sprinkle taco seasoning evenly over the chicken.
Top with diced onion, then pour tomatoes and green chiles over the top (do not stir).
Cover and cook on LOW for 6–8 hours or HIGH for 4–5 hours.
Remove lid and shred the chicken using two forks.
Add chopped cilantro and stir to combine.
Serve in tortillas or burrito bowls with your favorite toppings.
Optional: Use leftovers for enchiladas or nachos!
